mapper.select: SELECT B.MENU_NO AS menuNo , B.MENU_ORDR AS menuOrdr , B.MENU_NM AS menuNm , B.UPPER_MENU_NO AS upperMenuId , B.MENU_DC AS menuDc , B.RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS relateImagePath , B.RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS relateImageNm , B.PROGRM_FILE_NM AS progrmFileNm , (SELECT C.URL FROM IPD_PROGRMS C WHERE B.PROGRM_FILE_NM = C.PROGRM_FILE_NM) AS chkURL FROM IPD_MENU_AUTHOR A, IPD_MENUS B WHERE B.Menu_NO > 0 AND B.UPPER_MENU_NO = 0 AND A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT C.AUTHOR_CODE from IPD_MBER_AUTHOR C WHERE C.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tmp_UniqId}) ORDER BY MENU_ORDR

SELECT B.MENU_NO AS menuNo , B.MENU_ORDR AS menuOrdr , B.MENU_NM AS menuNm , B.UPPER_MENU_NO AS upperMenuId , B.RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS relateImagePath , B.RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS relateImageNm , (SELECT C.URL FROM IPD_PROGRMS C WHERE B.PROGRM_FILE_NM = C.PROGRM_FILE_NM) AS chkURL FROM IPD_MENU_AUTHOR A, IPD_MENUS B WHERE A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE from IPD_MBER_AUTHOR WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tmp_UniqId}) ORDER BY B.MENU_ORDR
SELECT URL FROM IPD_PROGRMS WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM = (SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM FROM IPD_MENUS WHERE MENU_NO = #{menuNo})

select MIN(MENU_NO) from IPD_MENUS where UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo} and MENU_ORDR = (select MIN(MENU_ORDR) from IPD_MENU_AUTHOR A, IPD_MENUS B where A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE from IPD_MBER_AUTHOR WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tempValue}) AND B.UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo})

select count(MENU_NO) from IPD_MENUS where UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo} and MENU_ORDR = (select MIN(MENU_ORDR) from IPD_MENU_AUTHOR A, IPD_MENUS B where A.MENU_NO = B.MENU_NO AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE from IPD_MBER_AUTHOR WHERE SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{tempValue}) AND B.UPPER_MENU_NO = #{menuNo})
